alert.note: Alert for Elk; McKean (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:06AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ELK AND MCKEAN COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM EDT... At 205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Allegany State Park to near Marienville to near Knox. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Bradford, Ridgway, Kane, Johnsonburg, Port Allegany, Smethport, Wetmore, Shinglehouse, Betula, Wilcox, James City, Rew, Crosby, Ludlow, Marshburg, East Branch Dam, Kinzua Bridge State Park, Portland Mills and Coryville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.
